蔚成.definition: to afford (a magnificent view etc); to become (a prevailing fashion etc)

蔚為大觀.definition: to afford a magnificent sight (idiom); enchanting

蔚然成風.definition: to have become common practice (idiom); to become a general trend

蔚縣.definition: Yu county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
